name: Toast Troubles
description:
This is for a game jam were you only have 1 hour to make a game and this weeks them was: What to do if it doesn't work?

The game: Toast Troubles is a physics based get the toast out of the broken toaster them up. Sadly I didn't have enough time to add sound and the menu's look terrible... but anyway enjoy. :D

My twitter - https://twitter.com/mrmangomonster?lang=en-gb

Details:

- All assets are mine

- All made by me (Nathan Richardson)

- Made using the Blender Game Engine (don't judge)
